name: Cheng Yang 0002
content: Cheng Yang's Homepage Cheng Yang Assistant Professor Data Mining and Machine Learning Group (DMGroup), School of Computer Science, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, Beijing, China. Email: albertyang33 [at] gmail.com Research Interests: social computing, network representation learning Education and Experience | Publications Publications [Google Scholar] Invited Talks I gave an introduction about "Graph Neural Networks based NLP Applications" (in Chinese) at SMP 2019 conference [slides][review paper]. Thesis I passed my thesis defense on May 30th, 2019. Here's my thesis paper (in Chinese). Journal and Conference Papers 2019 Cheng Yang, Maosong Sun, Haoran Liu, Shiyi Han, Zhiyuan Liu, Huanbo Luan.
